alert.note: Alert for Lake; Mendocino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 14 at 2:23PM PDT until March 15 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of central California and northwest California, including the following counties, in central California, Lake. In northwest California, Mendocino. * WHEN...Until 630 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 223 PM PDT, gauge reports indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lakeport, Upper Lake, Middletown, Clearlake, Glenhaven, Soda Bay, Mount Konocti, Konocti Bay, Hough Springs, Finley, North Lakeport, Barkerville, Seigler Springs, Loch Lomond, Adams, Saratoga Springs, Ettawa Springs, Hobergs, Witter Springs and Forest Lake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
